Calculator

Class Calculator

  • java.lang.Object
    • javafx.application.Application
      • Calculator.Calculator

  • public class Calculator
extends javafx.application.Application

    Title: Calculator Class.

    Description: A JavaFX demonstration application and baseline for a sequence of projects

    Copyright: Lynn Robert Carter Â© 2019

    Version:
    4.01 2019-01-29 The mainline of a JavaFX-based GUI implementation of a long integer calculator, 4.02 2019-02-19 The mainline of a JavaFX-based GUI implementation of Double calculator with log base2, 4.03 2019-03-20 The mainline of a javaFX-based GUI implementation of Double Calculator with FSM, 4.04 2019-04-04 The mainline of a javaFX-based GUI implementation of Double Calculator with Error Term, 4.05 2019-09-29 The mainline of a JavaFX-based GUI Implementation of a UNumber Calculator with SquareRoot, 4.06 2019-11-24 The mainline of a JavaFX-based GUI Implementation of a Scientific Calculator with Units., 4.07 2020-03-12 The mainline of a JavaFX-based GUI Implementation of Programmable Calculator.
    Author:
    Lynn Robert Carter (Baseline), Jatin Thakur

      • start

        public void start(javafx.stage.Stage theStage)
           throws java.lang.Exception
        This is the start method that is called once the application has been loaded into memory and is ready to get to work. In designing this application I have elected to IGNORE all opportunities for automatic layout support and instead have elected to manually position each GUI element and its properties in order to exercise complete control over the user interface look and feel.
        Specified by:
